knowledges_ids.K0001: Knowledge of computer networking concepts and protocols, and network security methodologies.

knowledges_ids.K0002: Knowledge of risk management processes (e.g., methods for assessing and mitigating risk).

knowledges_ids.K0003: Knowledge of laws, regulations, policies, and ethics as they relate to cybersecurity and privacy.

knowledges_ids.K0004: Knowledge of cybersecurity and privacy principles.

knowledges_ids.K0005: Knowledge of cyber threats and vulnerabilities.

knowledges_ids.K0006: Knowledge of specific operational impacts of cybersecurity lapses.

knowledges_ids.K0043: Knowledge of industry-standard and organizationally accepted analysis principles and methods.

knowledges_ids.K0048: Knowledge of Risk Management Framework (RMF) requirements.

knowledges_ids.K0059: Knowledge of new and emerging information technology (IT) and cybersecurity technologies.

knowledges_ids.K0072: Knowledge of resource management principles and techniques.

knowledges_ids.K0090: Knowledge of system life cycle management principles, including software security and usability.

knowledges_ids.K0120: Knowledge of how information needs and collection requirements are translated, tracked, and prioritized across the extended enterprise.

knowledges_ids.K0126: Knowledge of Supply Chain Risk Management Practices (NIST SP 800-161

knowledges_ids.K0148: Knowledge of import/export control regulations and responsible agencies for the purposes of reducing supply chain risk.

knowledges_ids.K0150: Knowledge of enterprise incident response program, roles, and responsibilities.

knowledges_ids.K0154: Knowledge of supply chain risk management standards, processes, and practices.

knowledges_ids.K0164: Knowledge of functionality, quality, and security requirements and how these will apply to specific items of supply (i.e., elements and processes).

knowledges_ids.K0169: Knowledge of information technology (IT) supply chain security and supply chain risk management policies, requirements, and procedures.

knowledges_ids.K0194: Knowledge of Cloud-based knowledge management technologies and concepts related to security, governance, procurement, and administration.

knowledges_ids.K0196: Knowledge of Import/Export Regulations related to cryptography and other security technologies.

knowledges_ids.K0198: Knowledge of organizational process improvement concepts and process maturity models (e.g., Capability Maturity Model Integration (CMMI) for Development, CMMI for Services, and CMMI for Acquisitions).

knowledges_ids.K0200: Knowledge of service management concepts for networks and related standards (e.g., Information Technology Infrastructure Library, current version [ITIL]).

knowledges_ids.K0235: Knowledge of how to leverage research and development centers, think tanks, academic research, and industry systems.

knowledges_ids.K0249: Knowledge of sustainment technologies, processes and strategies.

knowledges_ids.K0257: Knowledge of information technology (IT) acquisition/procurement requirements.

knowledges_ids.K0270: Knowledge of the acquisition/procurement life cycle process.

skills_ids.S0038: Skill in identifying measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system.

skills_ids.S0372: Skill to translate, track, and prioritize information needs and intelligence collection requirements across the extended enterprise.

abilities_ids.A0009: Ability to apply supply chain risk management standards.

abilities_ids.A0031: Ability to conduct and implement market research to understand government and industry capabilities and appropriate pricing.

abilities_ids.A0039: Ability to oversee the development and update of the life cycle cost estimate.

abilities_ids.A0045: Ability to evaluate/ensure the trustworthiness of the supplier and/or product.

abilities_ids.A0056: Ability to ensure security practices are followed throughout the acquisition process.

tasks_ids.T0072: Develop methods to monitor and measure risk, compliance, and assurance efforts.

tasks_ids.T0174: Perform needs analysis to determine opportunities for new and improved business process solutions.

tasks_ids.T0196: Provide advice on project costs, design concepts, or design changes.

tasks_ids.T0204: Provide input to implementation plans and standard operating procedures.

tasks_ids.T0207: Provide ongoing optimization and problem-solving support.

tasks_ids.T0208: Provide recommendations for possible improvements and upgrades.

tasks_ids.T0220: Resolve conflicts in laws, regulations, policies, standards, or procedures.

tasks_ids.T0223: Review or conduct audits of information technology (IT) programs and projects.

tasks_ids.T0256: Evaluate the effectiveness of procurement function in addressing information security requirements and supply chain risks through procurement activities and recommend improvements.

tasks_ids.T0273: Develop and document supply chain risks for critical system elements, as appropriate.

tasks_ids.T0277: Ensure that all acquisitions, procurements, and outsourcing efforts address information security requirements consistent with organization goals.

tasks_ids.T0302: Develop contract language to ensure supply chain, system, network, and operational security are met.

tasks_ids.T0340: Act as a primary stakeholder in the underlying information technology (IT) operational processes and functions that support the service, provide direction and monitor all significant activities so the service is delivered successfully.

tasks_ids.T0354: Coordinate and manage the overall service provided to a customer end-to-end.

tasks_ids.T0370: Ensure that appropriate Service-Level Agreements (SLAs) and underpinning contracts have been defined that clearly set out for the customer a description of the service and the measures for monitoring the service.

tasks_ids.T0377: Gather feedback on customer satisfaction and internal service performance to foster continual improvement.

tasks_ids.T0389: Review service performance reports identifying any significant issues and variances, initiating, where necessary, corrective actions and ensuring that all outstanding issues are followed up.

tasks_ids.T0394: Work with other service managers and product owners to balance and prioritize services to meet overall customer requirements, constraints, and objectives.

tasks_ids.T0412: Conduct import/export reviews for acquiring systems and software.

tasks_ids.T0414: Develop supply chain, system, network, performance, and cybersecurity requirements.

tasks_ids.T0493: Lead and oversee budget, staffing, and contracting.

tasks_ids.T0525: Provide enterprise cybersecurity and supply chain risk management guidance.

tasks_ids.T0551: Draft and publish supply chain security and risk management documents.

tasks_ids.T0553: Apply cybersecurity functions (e.g., encryption, access control, and identity management) to reduce exploitation opportunities.
